item.title: Creating Your Own US Netflix Proxy with Google Cloud
item.description: Say you wanted to create your own Unblock-Us or Tunlr service… maybe for educational purposes or maybe because Netflix is starting to block access from VPN providers used by people for region-restriction bypass. Either way, with cloud computing it’s easy and fairly cheap. The following setup you can accomplish it on your favorite cloud provider. In my case: Google Cloud’s GCE. GCE does come with a trial (60 days/$300 USD), and you can set that up here: https://console.
